publicationStmt.publisher: To the Reader: The English Preface in Print, c. 1475-1640 / Early English Books Online Text Creation Partnership

monogr.title: The 14. of September. A relation of many memorable passages from Rome, Italy, Spaine, France, Germany, the Lovv-Countries, the Palatinate, and other places : with some famous exploits performed at Bergen-Vpzom since the 4. of this moneth, stilo nouo

div.head: ADVERTISEMENTS From Forraine Parts.
div.p: I Haue (though later) sent you the occurrents of Newes frō diuers places; If they come not to your hands so soone as peraduenture you doe expect, impute it not to any negligence or want of good will towards you, but rather, for that I would first be possest truly of the truth of what I send you, which I can by no meanes be if I shall post you ouer Newes vpon the first report, which can neither be so true, nor so particular, and therefore vnlesse I receiue writing (from each seuerall place, of each seuerall action) from men of the best credit, I will not offer it to your serious view, neither will I write you the same things which I writ you before as neere as I can; yet peraduenture some passages may be reported againe which the circumstance of time may make different: So for present, commending vnto you such things as I haue receiued, by this Post, doe take leaue,

closer.dateline: From Don Hage, this 6. of September, 1622.
